#summary The font element changes the size and color of text.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *font element*

== Usage ==

The `font` element is deprecated in [SpecificationHTML4 HTML 4].

[SpecificationHTML5 HTML 5] says, "The font element doesn't represent anything. It must not be used except by WYSIWYG editors, which may use it to achieve presentational affects. Even WYSIWYG editors, however, should make every effort to use appropriate semantic markup and avoid the use of media-specific presentational markup."
